mapper.select: select b.no as no, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, b.hit as hit, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i') as regDate, b.g_no as groupNo, b.o_no as orderNo, b.depth as depth, a.no as userNo, a.name as userName from user a,board b where a.no = b.user_no order by g_no desc,o_no asc
select no, user_no as userNo, title, contents, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth from board where no = #{no }

choose.when: insert into board values(null,#{title },#{contents },0,now(),(select ifnull(max(g_no),0)+1 from board a),1,0,#{userNo })

mapper.update: update board set o_no = (o_no+1) where #{orderNo} < o_no
update board set hit = (hit+1) where no = #{boardNo }
